hero.description: PetID uses blockchain technology to create immutable and secure records for your pets, ensuring that their information is always accessible and protected.

features.title: Why choose PetID?
features.description: Our platform offers innovative solutions for registering and managing your pet's information with blockchain technology security.

secureRegistry.title: Secure Registry
secureRegistry.description: Information securely stored on the blockchain, guaranteeing authenticity and immutability.

simpleTransfer.title: Simple Transfer
simpleTransfer.description: Pet ownership transfer in a transparent way and without bureaucracy.

universalAccess.title: Universal Access
universalAccess.description: Access your pet's information from any device with internet connection.

completeHistory.title: Complete History
completeHistory.description: Keep all medical and vaccination history of your pet in one place.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Registering and managing your pet's information has never been so easy and secure.

connectWallet.title: Connect your wallet
connectWallet.description: Connect your ICP compatible digital wallet to start using PetID services.

registerPet.title: Register your pet
registerPet.description: Fill in your pet's information, including name, species, breed, age, and photo.

addMedicalHistory.title: Add medical history
addMedicalHistory.description: Include information about vaccines, medications, consultations and other health information.

accessAnytime.title: Access whenever needed
accessAnytime.description: The information will always be available when you need it, securely and reliably.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about PetID and how it can help you better care for your pet.

whatIs.question: What is PetID?
whatIs.answer: PetID is a decentralized platform that uses blockchain technology to create and manage digital records of pets, ensuring authenticity, security and immutability of information.

howToRegister.question: How can I register my pet?
howToRegister.answer: To register your pet, connect your digital wallet, click on 'Register Pet', fill in the requested information and submit the form. The registration will be processed on the Internet Computer blockchain.

whatInfo.question: What information can I store?
whatInfo.answer: You can store basic information such as name, species, breed, age, date of birth, photos, medical history, vaccines, medications, microchip information and much more.

transferOwnership.question: Is it possible to transfer pet ownership?
transferOwnership.answer: Yes, PetID allows the transfer of pet ownership to another user in a simple and transparent way, recording the entire transaction on the blockchain.

howMuch.question: How much does it cost to use PetID?
howMuch.answer: During the launch period, basic pet registration is free. Advanced features may have additional costs that will be clearly informed before use.

footer.description: Decentralized pet registry on the Internet Computer blockchain.
